paragraph: Richie Kidd is a British DJ and producer. Richie is a Fierce Angel and one half of the group 2 Deep Geeks. He is primarily known in the house music circuit in Europe and the Middle East. Richie has worked alongside many famous artists and producers throughout his career including Danny Rampling, Jamie Lewis, Vanilla Ice and Semus Haji to name a few. Richie worked at Long's Bar (Tower's Rotana Hotel) in Dubai in 2008 as the resident DJ
Between Fall 2008 and Spring 2009 Richie worked as the Resident DJ at Club Maxxim in Bahrain. Richie currently works as the resident DJ at Barasti Beach Club in Dubai.

== Awards and nominations ==
Won an NME Award for his underground release on YouTube of "Doin it LL Cool J Remix Richie Kidd 2005"
